name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Gregorio TORO, III, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY, STEVENS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Gregorio TORO, III, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2014, the appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert Elinar Sletvold, Esq., for Gregorio Toro, III.
Rebecca J. Kulik, Esq., Northampton County District Attorney’s Office, John Michael Morganelli, Esq., for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
97 A.3d 741
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Gregorio TORO, III, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted June 4, 2014.
Decided Aug. 18, 2014.
Robert Elinar Sletvold, Esq., for Gregorio Toro, III.
Rebecca J. Kulik, Esq., Northampton County District Attorney’s Office, John Michael Morganelli, Esq., for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY, STEVENS, JJ.
